short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embark on an epic journey through Teyvat with stunning Genshin Impact visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the vibrant world of Genshin Impact with this stunning live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A breathtaking interface inspired by the colorful landscapes and characters of Teyvat.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the elegance and charm of Genshin Impact’s design.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy Genshin-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as immersive and exciting as the adventures in Genshin Impact.
